fields.value: Behavioral Tracking Survey (FSW & High risk MSM)- I - 2010 (By Alliance)

dsDescriptionValue.value: The objectives of the Behavioural Tracking Survey (BTS) were (1) To measure the major outcomes and impacts of the interventions funded by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF) under the Avahan India AIDS Initiative by collecting behavioral trend data in populations targeted by the interventions. (2) To understand the relationship between community mobilization and service indicator outcomes such as promotion of condom use, reduction in violence and improved service utilization.This survey was conducted in the five districts (Khammam, Warangal, Kurnool, Medak and Ananthapur) of Andhra Pradesh for FSW survey, while it covered only three districts (Khammam, Kurnool and Ananthapur) for High risk MSM survey by India HIV/AIDS Alliance.

keywordValue.value: Advocacy,  Behavioral tracking surveys with FSWs, Behavioral tracking surveys with MSM, Community mobilization, Community mobilization monitoring research (Avahan-CMMR), FSWs, High risk MSM, HIV, Sexual behavior;  INSTITUTION: HIV/AIDS Alliance;  STRATEGIC AREAS: FSWs, High risk MSM

fields.value: Behavioral Tracking Survey (BTS-2010) round 1, was conducted in 5 districts ( Khammam,  Warangal, Krnuool,  Medak,  Ananthpur) of Andhra Pradesh.  The study involved two stages viz., rapid remapping exercise followed by the sampling and quantitative survey. Probability Proportional to Size (PPS) sampling method was adopted for selection of different clusters. With in different clusters a total of 3187 samples were collected. A sample of 1986 FSWs were selected from Khammam, Warangal, Kurnool, Medak and Ananthapur districts of AP. While a total of 1201 High risk MSMs sample were selected from Khammam, Kurnool and Ananthapur districts of AP. The eligible Female Sex Workers (FSW) taken in the study were females aged 18 years or older, either brothel or street or lodge or home based, who sold sex in exchange for cash at least once in the past one month. Whereas Men who have Sex with other Men (High risk MSM) were taken from men aged 18 years or older, who had sex (oral/manual/anal) with other men at least once in the past one month.
